programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Family, Romance ║ 2004 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fictional account of the evolution and creation of children's classic Peter Pan, starring Johnny Depp as Scottish playwright JM Barrie. In the early 1900s, Barrie's lacklustre career is reinvigorated when he befriends the four fatherless Llewelyn Davies boys and their recently widowed mother, Sylvia. As their relationship develops, the seeds are sown for Barrie's most famous work Marc Forster - Director Johnny Depp - Sir James Matthew Barrie Kate Winslet - Sylvia Llewelyn Davies Julie Christie - Mrs Emma du Maurier Radha Mitchell - Mary Ansell Barrie Dustin Hoffman - Charles Frohman Kelly Macdonald - \Peter Pan Ian Hart - Sir Arthur Conan Doyle Eileen Essell - Mrs Snow Paul Whitehouse - Stage manager Freddie Highmore - Peter Llewelyn Davies Joe Prospero - Jack Llewelyn Davies Nick Roud - George Llewelyn Davies Luke Spill - Michael Llewelyn Davies Johnny Depp - Sir James Matthew Barrie Kate Winslet - Sylvia Llewelyn Davies Julie Christie - Mrs Emma du Maurier Radha Mitchell - Mary Ansell Barrie Dustin Hoffman - Charles Frohman Kelly Macdonald - \Peter Pan Ian Hart - Sir Arthur Conan Doyle Eileen Essell - Mrs Snow Paul Whitehouse - Stage manager Freddie Highmore - Peter Llewelyn Davies Joe Prospero - Jack Llewelyn Davies Nick Roud - George Llewelyn Davies Luke Spill - Michael Llewelyn Davies.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Children's ║ 2006 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Kevin James and Courteney Cox. While party loving cow Otis is out enjoying himself at a late-night barn dance, his father Ben is killed trying to protect the hen-house from an attack by coyotes. programme.title: The Sum of All Fears

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Fantasy, Horror, Drama, Mystery, Thriller ║ 2013 ║ 15
programme.desc: Supernatural horror starring Patrick Wilson, Vera Farmiga and Lili Taylor. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tech billionaire and gambler Jake Foley hosts a high-stakes poker game between childhood friends, offering them the chance to win more money than they've ever dreamed of. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. As the game unfolds, thieves break in and they must band together to survive a night of terror. programme.desc: Amar, a young and an honest man, is desperately in search of work in order to make ends meet for his mother and himself. Eventually, he gets a chance to work with the underworld.

programme.desc: Having escaped from abusive households, Tees Maar Khan and Vasudha form a familial bond. Years later, a tragedy involving the mafia leaves Tees Maar Khan vying for revenge.

programme.title: Suhaag
programme.desc: College friends Ajay and Raj always play pranks on each other and then get into trouble. One day, Ajay needs his birth certificate for his passport, but he is shocked to find out his real name.

programme.desc: Peturam, a sensitive and obese man, falls in love with a beautiful woman named Radha. However, her brother orders him to gather INR 10 lakh in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Hero Hindustani
programme.desc: A man realizes that India is completely alien to his London-raised granddaughter and arranges her marriage there. She gets a guide to pose as her fiance and falls for him.

programme.title: Suraj
programme.desc: Sangram seeks revenge by making the king's son Suraj (Rajendra Kumar) a bandit, who then kidnaps Princess Anuradha (Vyjayantimala). What happens when he's caught? A 1966 love story.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: The commando, Karanveer Singh Dogra, is approached to chase and catch an Indian criminal gang, who pose a threat to India itself.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (Movie @6) (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance'.

programme.title: Ragini MMS 2
programme.desc: A director attempts to shoot an erotic horror movie in a house in which a spirit resides. Before the crew can start filming, the spirit possesses the lead actress's body.

programme.title: Koi Mil Gaya
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards, including 'Best Special Effects, Best Director, Best Actor, Best Film, Best Screenplay, Best Cinematography, and Best Singer'.

programme.title: Hum Paanch
programme.desc: (1980) The story of a brave woman who stands up against the ruthlessness of a landlord and decides to teach him a lesson. Starring Shabana Azmi, Sanjeev Kumar and Mithun.

programme.title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baraat
programme.desc: Raja rapes Mala and the court orders him to marry her. His family continues to torture Mala and attempts to kill her, but she manages to win over Raja and his family with her good deeds.

programme.title: Brahmachari
programme.desc: (1968) An orphan, Brahmachari, who lives with twelve other young orphans, promises to help a young woman, Sheetal, to unite her childhood betrothed in return for money.

programme.title: Vidhaata
programme.desc: Shammi Kapoor won the 'Best Supporting Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1983.

programme.title: Aarzoo
programme.desc: (1999) Love triangle drama about Pooja (Madhuri Dixit) who loves Vijay (Akshay Kumar) but her father wants her to marry Aman (Saif Ali). Whom will Pooja eventually settle with?

programme.title: Radhe Shyam
programme.desc: (Movie @6) World-renowned palmist Vikramaditya falls head over heels in love with doctor Prerana on a train journey. However, the lovers must rewrite their destiny and even cheat death to be together.

programme.title: WAQT: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Shefali Shah won Best Supporting Actress in Stardust Awards, India 2006.

programme.title: Bad Boy
programme.desc: When a good-for-nothing Raghu falls in love with the studious Ritu, it feels like a recipe for disaster. Especially, as Ritu's family is against their relationship. How will the lovers unite?

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.

programme.title: Gopi
programme.desc: A man stays with his brother in a village and is falsely accused of theft by the landlord. When his brother throws him out, he goes to the city and vows to return only after making money.

programme.title: Kalicharan
programme.desc: (1976) Story of a police officer who goes undercover to catch a wealthy and reputed person involved in criminal activities. Stars Shatrughan Sinha, Reena Roy and Ajit.

programme.title: Socha Na Tha
programme.desc: (2005) Viren can't imagine having an arranged marriage. His parents want him to meet Aditi. They refuse to get married but stay friends. Will Cupid strike and change their minds?

programme.title: Deewar
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Haunted by the past, Vijay turns to crime, while Ravi, his younger brother, becomes an honest cop. Fate pits them against each other when Ravi is sent to nab Vijay.

programme.title: Thappad
programme.desc: This Movie claimed best film in Asian Films Awards, Awards of the International Indian Film Academy Best Dialogue, Gender Sensitivity Award, Tapsee Pannu got Best Actress award for this movie.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including 'Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment' at the National Film Awards, India 1995.

programme.title: Holiday - A Soldier is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: This movie won Most Entertaining Action Film in the Big Star Entertainment Awards. Plus, Lux Awards for Best Film, Director (Shekhar Kapur), Actor (Anil Kapoor) and Actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Saudagar
programme.desc: Subhash Ghai won the 'Best Director' award and Gurudutt Shirali won the 'Best Editor award at the Filmfare Awards 1992.

programme.title: Sanam
programme.desc: Gaurav is deprived of love from his family. After his elder brother Narendra dies in an accident, Gaurav attempts to fill-in for him and joins the army to make his father proud.

programme.title: Half Girlfriend
programme.desc: Madhav meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she halfheartedly agrees to be his 'Half Girlfriend'.

programme.title: Zero
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Bauua, short stature, falls in love with Aafia, scientist suffering from cerebral palsy, but soon breaks up with her. Later, what he learns of Aafia changes his life forever.

programme.title: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
programme.desc: Bhaijaan, a self-avowed bachelor, decides to give up on violence when he falls in love with Bhagyalakshmi. Will he go back to his old ways when he learns about her family's rivalry with a gangster?

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: A 1977 romantic film of Sapna (Hema Malini) who traps a rich man Anupam (Dharmendra), in her love, as he believes she's his Dream Girl - a name that stayed with the actress forever!

programme.title: Bharat
programme.desc: Bharat is one of the highest grossing film in 2020 also won many awards for Best actor and Best songs of the year.

programme.title: Bareily Ki Barfi
programme.desc: This movie won many awards for different categories like Best Actress, Best Director, Best Scriptwriting, Best Production Design, Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: Don
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan won the 'Best Actor' award, Kishore Kumar won the 'Best Singer - Male award and Asha Bhosle won the 'Best Singer - Female' award at the Filmfare Awards 1979.

programme.title: Pukar
programme.desc: Anil Kapoor won Best Actor Award for this movie, Rajkumar Santoshi won the awards for his direction.

programme.title: Veere Di Wedding
programme.desc: Kalindi friends, come to meet her after they learn about her wedding with her boyfriend, Rishabh. Sakshi takes her girls to Thailand and they rediscover themselves.

programme.title: Good Newwz
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhits) Best Supporting Actress' was awarded to Kiara Advani by the International Indian Film Academy 2020. 'Best Comic Actor' was awarded to Diljit Dosanjh by the Zee Cine Awards 2020.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: Sunny (Sunny Deol) and Roma (Amrita Singh) are childhood friends who meet and fall in love after several years. But their parents are arch foes and will oppose their marriage.

programme.title: Kaho Naa Pyar Hai
programme.desc: The movie was the highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2000 and won several awards including 'Best Film, Best Actor, Best Debut Actor, Best Director, Best Singer - Male/Female.

programme.title: Grand Masti
programme.desc: This movie claimed Power Club - Box Office Award in Zee Cine Awards.

programme.title: Don 2
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan won many awards for this movie. This is one of the highest grossing films of 2011.

programme.title: Kranti
programme.desc: (1981) Kranti is the story of India's freedom struggle against the British. Of two brave men who formed bands of revolutionaries to fight for an Independent India.

programme.title: Bawaal
programme.desc: A small-town man who falls in love with the most beautiful girl in town. He wants to marry her one day because marrying her can raise his social position.

programme.title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
programme.desc: The film won several award including, 'Best Film, Best Director, Best Music, Best Singer - Male, Best Debut Actor - Male, Best Cinematographer' at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: Crew
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) Hailed as 'delectable' by The Times of India, this Rajesh Krishnan-directed comedy follows three bold flight attendants caught in a gold smuggling ring.

programme.title: Sagar
programme.desc: These films praised with many categorical awards like Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Supporting Role - Male, Best Playback Singer - Male.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?
